name: Shiftbox
author: Arron Schaar, Daniel Buchner
description: A container element that allows you to slide aside a main <x-shift> element to reveal secondary content such as menus, widgets, or settings lists underneath.

attributes.shift: Direction to shift the main content. right, left, up, down, upright, downright, upleft, downleft
attributes.open: Boolean attribute that opens the shiftbox

methods.toggle: Toggles the open attribute to open and close.

events.opened: Fires after the shiftbox has opened.
events.closed: Fires after the shiftbox has closed.
